name: Jungle Hostages
description:
Storyline take place in our time in the jungle. A group of tourists are attacked by bandits and taken hostage in order to get their organs for transplant. But five of them manage to escape. There are five playable characters in the game. With these characters you have to play the game. To complete the game, you must save at least one of the characters.

The main dangers in the game are local bandits, predators, diseases and injuries. The bandits are interested in catching the player alive so as not to damage the organs. Therefore, they will not use firearms.

Features:

Huge seamless procedural world.

A game with a third-person view with elements of stealth.

The game has five playable characters between which you can switch during the game.
